title: Software Engineer, Atlas
description: As a Software Engineer on the team, you will build and ship features into North, our AI workspace platform, and collaborate closely with researchers to refine parsing strategies for effective search outcomes.
requirements: Experience with database migrations, ETL pipelines, and transforming raw data
Built personal or professional projects using search, retrievals, or vector databases
Strong coding abilities and comfortable working across the stack
Excited by the challenge of securely connecting users to their most relevant data
Nice to have: Experience with Kubernetes or React
Experience in both large enterprises and startups
Ability to excel in fast-paced environments
benefits: An open and inclusive culture and work environment
Work closely with a team on the cutting edge of AI research
Weekly lunch stipend, in-office lunches & snacks
Full health and dental benefits, including a budget for mental health
100% Parental Leave top-up for up to 6 months
Personal enrichment benefits towards arts and culture, fitness and well-being
Remote-flexible, offices in multiple cities, and a co-working stipend
